ai-vv15:11.3_0: But when I’ve come to my wealth,

ai-vv15:13.1_0: And in my name bow with your head to your feet.
ai-vv15:13.2_0: ‘Sir, the laywoman named Venāgapura bows with his head to your feet.’
ai-vv15:13.3_0: “It’s incredible, sir, I would answer the Buddha about the fruits of the ascetic life-span.”
